snippet: Carrie Underwood won't be "waiting all day for Sunday night" this fall when NBC premieres a new theme song for its prime-time "Sunday Night Football" program....
lead_paragraph: Carrie Underwood won't be "waiting all day for Sunday night" this fall when NBC premieres a new theme song for its prime-time "Sunday Night Football" program.

headline.main: NBC to Unveil New Theme Song for 'Sunday Night Football'
headline.print_headline: NBC to Unveil New Theme Song for 'Sunday Night Football'
